item.title: 7 Insights from working in Digital Ads at customer side after working at an agency
item.description: For almost 5 years I worked inside a digital agency and looked at client issues as a contractor. After the agency, I've been working on the client side for over 3 years and I notice a huge difference in approach. My findings from inside the business in the article are.
